MemoryInfobox.description: 'The mighty Arges, known as the Bright One, was active once again. He was seen, hungry and prowling, in the Cyclops Arges|bowels of a fiery Nisyros|volcano.'

General_Description: '''The Bright One''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra travelled to the island of [[Nisyros]] to eliminate [[cyclops]] [[Arges]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra arrived on the island of Nisyros. Exploring further, she found an opening to a mysterious [[Cyclops Arges|vault]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''He's over there.''
Entering, she came across an arena filled with lava and a giant cyclops. After some effort, she defeated the beast.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra defeated Arges, claiming its [[Hammer of Hephaistos|war hammer]].
